strings.Value: "I once knew a woman who seemed infatuated with my esteemed personality. Although she had the audacity to call me a "worthy disciple of Irori"! I couldn't stand being with anyone that ignorant!"
"Do you also make your lovers wear a bridle? Or is kissing your feet enough for you?"
"But why? You might have helped her â€” taught her something. What's the point of being knowledgeable if you won't share your knowledge with others?"
"A suitor once confused my favorite wine with one I detest. I threw him out without another thought!"
